code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={restaurant:{id:null,imgUrl:null,title:null,rating:null,genre:null,address:null,short_description:null,dishes:null}};export var restaurantSlice=createSlice({name:'restaurant',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setRestaurant:function setRestaurant(state,action){state.restaurant=action.payload;}}});var setRestaurant=restaurantSlice.actions.setRestaurant;export{setRestaurant};export var selectRestaurant=function selectRestaurant(state){return state.restaurant.restaurant;};export default restaurantSlice.reducer;
